verses.verse: In Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I have taken <S%H2620><s%> refuge; <S%H2620><s%> Let me never <S%H408><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be ashamed. <S%H954><s%>
In Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, and rescue <S%H6403><s%> me; Incline <S%H5186><s%> Thine ear <S%H241><s%> to me, and save <S%H3467><s%> me.

Be Thou to me a rock <S%H6697><s%> of habitation, <S%H4583><s%> to which I may continually <S%H8548><s%> come; <S%H935><s%> Thou hast given <S%H6680><s%> commandment <S%H6680><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me, For Thou art my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress. <S%H4686><s%>

Rescue <S%H6403><s%> me, O my God, <S%H430><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> Out of the grasp <S%H3709><s%> of the wrongdoer <S%H5765><s%> and ruthless <S%H9145><s%> man, <S%H9145><s%>
For Thou art my hope; <S%H8615><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> [Thou art] my confidence <S%H4009><s%> from my youth. <S%H5271><s%>

By Thee I have been sustained <S%H5564><s%> from [my] birth; <S%H990><s%> Thou art He who took <S%H1491><s%> me from my mother's womb; <S%H990><s%> My praise <S%H8416><s%> is continually <S%H8548><s%> of Thee.
I have become <S%H1961><s%> a marvel <S%H4159><s%> to many; <S%H7227><s%> For Thou art my strong <S%H5797><s%> refuge. <S%H4268><s%>
My mouth <S%H6310><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with Thy praise, <S%H8416><s%> And with Thy glory <S%H8597><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long.
Do not cast <S%H7993><s%> me off <S%H7993><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of old <S%H2209><s%> age; <S%H2209><s%> Do not forsake <S%H5800><s%> me when my strength <S%H3581><s%> fails. <S%H3615><s%>
For my enemies <S%H340><s%> have spoken <S%H559><s%> against me; And those who watch <S%H8104><s%> for my life <S%H5315><s%> have consulted <S%H3289><s%> together, <S%H9191><s%>

Saying, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> him; Pursue <S%H7291><s%> and seize <S%H8610><s%> him, for there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>"
O God, <S%H430><s%> do not be far <S%H7368><s%> from me; O my God, <S%H430><s%> hasten <S%H2363><s%> to my help! <S%H5833><s%>

Let those who are adversaries <S%H7853><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%> [and] consumed; <S%H3615><s%> Let them be covered <S%H5844><s%> with reproach <S%H2781><s%> and dishonor, <S%H3639><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> to injure <S%H9567><s%> me.
But as for me, I will hope <S%H3176><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> And will praise <S%H8416><s%> Thee yet <S%H3254><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> and more. <S%H3254><s%>

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall tell <S%H5608><s%> of Thy righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> [And] of Thy salvation <S%H8668><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long; For I do not know <S%H3045><s%> the sum <S%H5615><s%> [of them.]

I will come <S%H935><s%> with the mighty <S%H1369><s%> deeds <S%H1369><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> God; <S%H3068><s%> I will make <S%H2142><s%> mention <S%H2142><s%> of Thy righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> Thine alone. <S%H905><s%>
O God, <S%H430><s%> Thou hast taught <S%H3925><s%> me from my youth; <S%H5271><s%> And I still <S%H5704><s%> <S%H2008><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> Thy wondrous <S%H6381><s%> deeds. <S%H6381><s%>

And even <S%H1571><s%> when <S%H5704><s%> [I am] old <S%H2209><s%> and gray, <S%H7872><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> do not forsake <S%H5800><s%> me, Until <S%H5704><s%> I declare <S%H5046><s%> Thy strength <S%H2220><s%> to [this] generation, <S%H1755><s%> Thy power <S%H1369><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> who are to come. <S%H935><s%>

For Thy righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> [reaches] to the heavens, <S%H4791><s%> Thou who <S%H834><s%> hast done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> things; <S%H1419><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> Thee?

Thou, who <S%H834><s%> hast shown <S%H7200><s%> me many <S%H7227><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%> and distresses, <S%H9567><s%> Wilt revive <S%H2421><s%> me again, <S%H7725><s%> And wilt bring <S%H5927><s%> me up again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H8415><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Mayest Thou increase <S%H7235><s%> my greatness, <S%H1420><s%> And turn <S%H5437><s%> [to] comfort <S%H5162><s%> me.

I will also <S%H1571><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Thee with a harp, <S%H5035><s%> [Even] Thy truth, <S%H571><s%> O my God; <S%H430><s%> To Thee I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> with the lyre, <S%H3658><s%> O Thou Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

My lips <S%H8193><s%> will shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> I sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thee; And my soul, <S%H5315><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast redeemed. <S%H6299><s%>

My tongue <S%H3956><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> will utter <S%H1897><s%> Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long; For they are ashamed, <S%H954><s%> for they are humiliated <S%H2659><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> my hurt. <S%H9567><s%>
